channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ThirstyAffiliates

item.title: CVE-2021-24127|2024-08-03T19:21:18.298Z -- unknown -- thirstyaffiliates
item.description: Unvalidated input and lack of output encoding in the ThirstyAffiliates Affiliate Link Manager WordPress plugin, versions before 3.9.3, was vulnerable to authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS), which could lead to privilege escalation.
